title: Intoducing: Jewellers
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/jewellers.jpg "jewellers")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6830-intoducing-jewellers/attachment/jewellers) [**Jewellers**](http://www.facebook.com/Jewellersmusic) come from a part of the world that has been almost untouched by the music they create; Newport, Wales. Despite the lack of local contemporaries, their work is mesmerizing and unnervingly enchanting, the two-piece manipulate and distort drones into remarkable grooves and melodies with ease. Best of all, their debut LP is absolutely free, so pick it up bellow. Sleep Education by Jewellers
